Package src.Util

Class DataStore

java.lang.Object
src.Util.DataStore
public class DataStore extends Object
The DataStore class is responsible for saving various types of application data to CSV files, including staff, patient, appointment, doctor availability, medicine, request, and medical history data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DataStore()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    saveAll()
    Saves all data types by calling individual methods to save staff, patient, appointment, doctor availability, medicine, request, and medical history data to their respective files.
    static void
    saveAppointmentData()
    Saves appointment data to a CSV file, including details such as patient ID, doctor ID, date, time, status, type of service, consultation notes, and prescribed medications.
    static void
    saveDoctorAvailability()
    Saves each doctor's availability data to a CSV file, including their weekly schedule.
    static void
    saveMedicalHistory()
    Saves each patient's medical history to a CSV file, including details of diagnoses, treatment plans, and prescribed medications.
    static void
    saveMedicine()
    Saves medication data to a CSV file, including medicine name, stock level, and low stock threshold.
    static void
    savePatientData()
    Saves patient data to a CSV file, including personal details and contact information.
    static void
    saveRequest()
    Saves medication replenishment requests to a CSV file, including medicine name and request status.
    static void
    saveStaffData()
    Saves staff data to a CSV file, including attributes like staff ID, password, name, role, gender, and age.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • DataStore

      public DataStore()

  • Method Details

    • saveAll

      public static void saveAll()
      Saves all data types by calling individual methods to save staff, patient, appointment, doctor availability, medicine, request, and medical history data to their respective files.

    • saveStaffData

      public static void saveStaffData()
      Saves staff data to a CSV file, including attributes like staff ID, password, name, role, gender, and age.

    • saveDoctorAvailability

      public static void saveDoctorAvailability()
      Saves each doctor's availability data to a CSV file, including their weekly schedule. Days without availability are marked as "Not Available."

    • savePatientData

      public static void savePatientData()
      Saves patient data to a CSV file, including personal details and contact information.

    • saveMedicine

      public static void saveMedicine()
      Saves medication data to a CSV file, including medicine name, stock level, and low stock threshold.

    • saveRequest

      public static void saveRequest()
      Saves medication replenishment requests to a CSV file, including medicine name and request status.

    • saveMedicalHistory

      public static void saveMedicalHistory()
      Saves each patient's medical history to a CSV file, including details of diagnoses, treatment plans, and prescribed medications.

    • saveAppointmentData

      public static void saveAppointmentData()
      Saves appointment data to a CSV file, including details such as patient ID, doctor ID, date, time, status, type of service, consultation notes, and prescribed medications.
